Question.Subject: Is anyone having AOL Email Problems?
Question.Content: Is anyone having problems with AOL Email? So far they have lost my address book, pages fail to re-direct and emails get bounced for no good reason. Normally it is fine but now seems to be very flakey.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yes lots of people are having trouble accessing AOL mail. I use imap.aol.com on Outlook 2007 and it has been sporadic for two days. The AOL mail blog states that they have been having problems. I was able to access it with a POP account, but I don't want to do that.

Answer.Content: NOPE ONLY YOU BECAUSE YOU ARE THE ONLY ONE IN THE WHOLE UNIVERSE THAT STILL USES AOL!
Doesn't everyone have trouble with AOL. When I tried it it screwed up my computer for months until I was finally able to get rid of all the junk that comes with it.
Answer.Reference: Been there, learned a hard lesson.

Answer.Content: Yes lots of people are having trouble accessing AOL mail. I use imap.aol.com on Outlook 2007 and it has been sporadic for two days. The AOL mail blog states that they have been having problems. I was able to access it with a POP account, but I don't want to do that.
